author: Jason Platt
comment: This is my go-to watch face. It looks fantastic, especially in ambient mode.  Most watch faces look terrible in ambient mode, but not this one. I even like the blue glow that indicates the hour. It would be perfect if you could see exact battery percentages instead of the tiny meters. Removing a star until battery percentages are numbered.
title: Excellent Watch Face

author: Urban Renaissance
comment: Just average. It doesn't look premium. More watch face makers need to try to get as close to premium watch face design as possible. Look at Tag, Rolex, Omega, Breitling, etc and go from there. These watchfaces are cartoonish and childish in comparison. Not every tech guy is a nerd. Some actually have style and class.
title: Average

author: Francois Proulx
comment: Good looking, but disappointed that you cannot change the date format.  I would like to be able to show "VEN, 8 JANV" on just one line without the year... but I cannot.  Now it shows "8 VEN. JANV2016" on 2 lines which is difficult to read.

author: Nothing Special
comment: Why is the battery life so bad? After 8 hours I have 6% of life left. I love the face, but it's unusable.
title: Battery life stinks

comment: Synch confusing and dual time doesn't easily save. Once set is a good option.
title: Dual watch

author: Gregg S
comment: Great watch face, but since update in December the update weather button does not work. It will be 40 degrees but the watch shows 21 degrees (on all three weather sources). Go to watch page on phone and you can't press the update button.  I can on other interactive watch faces but not on Dual Watch Face.

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Gregg,

It will be removed soon in the next update release.
Tnx

author: Gary Jones
comment: Weather doesn't work unless you update it from the app manually. Could do with an hourly buzz function.
title: Good but has issues

author: Howard Bamber
comment: Still buggy. My favourite ready made watch. So sad it's so buggy.
title: Best duel time watch(when not buggy)

author: Phil Harnett
comment: The weather update does not work which is enough for me to look elsewhere for a new watch face.
title: Good but.....

author: Eric Townsend
comment: I love analog/digital combo faces and I think this is one of the best looking. I really like the dual battery indicator too. LG Watch Urbane
title: Looks great

author: Gaspar Yabrudy
comment: The weather does not update
title: Weather doesn't work

author: frank mohr
comment: Nice face just wish they gave option to change the font
title: Good watch

author: Winsern Goh
comment: It looks good. But how do I adjust the second time

author: Ziad Al Naieb
comment: But is it compatible with Samsung gear s2

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Ziad,

no for now but you can expect in very soon.
We will let you know.

Regards

title: Love it so much

author: Ryan Streeter
comment: Make a square face

author: Arka Chatterjee
comment: Cant configure dual time zone...doesnt work

author: David Richards
comment: Add a step counter it would be 5 star
Excellent watch face, that is permanently on my watch

author: Indra Dewa Tirta Widjaja
comment: Good
title: Good

author: Marlon Santos
comment: As the subject says It always stops working after a few seconds. I even tried to reset. Moto 360 2nd gen. Please fix.
title: Unfortunately Dual has stopped working

author: Garry Mills
comment: Since update keeps stopping, doesn't load properly. LG Watch R

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Garry,

can you please try with reinstall?

Regards

title: Not working

author: Matt Barr
comment: Well done as you expect from Rich Face. Not quite as sharp as some of their others. Good customization options.

author: Isreal Mathew
comment: I like this watch face a lot. Really like that you've included the weather detail.
title: Nice clear face, responsive developer

author: Andi Darmika
comment: I like this watch face very much. Please please please add brightness setting for dim/ambient mode.

author: M Ashi
comment: Love full ambient mode hope you apply it to all your watch faces
title: Way to go

author: Mathieu Vidal
comment: Please update the app as mentioned in previous comments to remove the blue glow on the outer bezel. Would give 5 stars if the option was available. Thanks

author: Ian Davis
comment: Textures and resolution look great on moto 360. Being able to have a smooth second hand and stay illuminated for 25 seconds also lets you show off the watch a bit more when people notice it (which happens on a daily basis). Just a classic,great looking and useful watch face. Highly recommended, especially for the price.
title: Well worth it

author: adrian preddie
comment: The look caught my eye..  But on my moto 360 it wasn't as crisp as it could be, also to temperature won't update even after restart,  the weather refresh button does not seem to work..  It shows 32 degrees all the time..  When it's 88 outside.. Lol
title: Not as crisp as I would like

author: Val Cor
comment: Font size on date, time and temperature smaller than the picture. Gauges that show battery level for watch and phone are not functional. I have a Nexus 6 and Huawei watch.
title: Incomplete

author: Noah Aharown
comment: I have a Sony Smartwatch 3 and there is a big blank spots on every corner. Can you please update date? Thanks

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Noah,

Could you please send us a screenshot via email. We will be happy to fix the issue.
Regards

title: Dr.Aharown

author: Ash Webb
comment: Nice face, if you are going to remove the blue accent please make it optional. Also, like the dotted font for the other time but maybe a clearer font for the tinier text.
title: Nice

author: cmhayden61
comment: Looks great on my lg g r runs very smooth. I have one suggestion though is the ability to turn off the blue glow that follows the hour hand.
title: Great

author: Felix Ng
comment: I had many watch face designs, but most of the time this is my choice! Awesome! Oh yes! Please do not remove the blue sunray reflection! I love it...

author: BC BC
comment: This could be much nicer.
title: The numbers are not centered or aligned right.

author: Oliver Borchert
comment: Great watchface. The battery usage is high. I hope it will be fixed. Then it's very cool.
title: Great watchface

author: Ashok Kumar
comment: Looks attractive in moto360. But the temperature is not updating. Please fix
title: Looks good

author: Dan Taylor
comment: Don't show up on lg g r. Refund

reply.author: RichFace
reply.content:
Hi Daniel,

Try this:
Go to Android Wear Application, open Settings and use Re-sync apps option. 
If it does not work, please disconnect devices (watch and phone), 
uninstall our watch face, restart watch and connect device again, 
then finally install our watch face.

If that doesn't help contact us to make refund.

Regards

title: Lg g r

author: Tuong Le
comment: Awesome on my Moto 360, LG R
title: Great

author: Kjell J
comment: Looks good on G Watch R.
title: Looks good

author: Martin
comment: Nice watch face!
title: Nice watch face
